products.facts: ["Made primarily from milk chocolate, sugar, and vegetable oils.","Packaging is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","Quality ingredients are sourced from sustainable farms to ensure ethical production.","Contains no artificial preservatives, maintaining a natural taste and texture."]

products.name: Twirl
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Cocoa and its products,Confectioneries,Bars,Chocolate candies,Chocolates,Bars-covered-with-chocolate,Candy chocolate bars,milk chocolate
products.facts: ["Twirl - 43g is wrapped in recyclable foil packaging.","The ingredients include sustainably sourced cocoa and milk.","Twirl bars are certified by the Rainforest Alliance for sustainable farming practices.","The product is made in a factory that adheres to high quality and safety standards."]

products.name: Tremoços
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Canned foods, Legumes, Canned plant-based foods, Pickles, Plant-based pickles, Canned legumes, Canned common beans, Legume pickles, Pickled lupin beans, en:legume-seeds
products.facts: ["TremoÃ§os are made from lupin beans, which are naturally high in protein and fiber.","The cultivation of lupin is considered environmentally friendly, as it requires less water and fertilizers compared to other crops.","TremoÃ§os are often used as a healthy snack option due to their low fat content and rich nutrient profile.","The product is typically packaged in eco-friendly materials to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Pan tostado
products.stores: Abarrotes,Chedraui,La Comercial,Superama,City Club,Sam's Club,Bodega Aurrerá,Walmart,Mercado Soriana,Soriana
products.facts: ["Pan tostado is typically made from high-quality wheat flour, ensuring a crisp texture.","The packaging is often recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Many brands use natural ingredients without preservatives, promoting better health.","Pan tostado is often baked rather than fried, making it a lower-fat snack option."]

products.name: 6 Thin Bagels Cinnamon & Raisin Sliced
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Special breads, Bagel breads
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality ingredients including cinnamon and raisins.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Low in calories compared to traditional bagels, making them a healthier choice.","Sliced for convenience, ensuring even toasting and easy sandwich making."]

products.name: Simply tomato ketchup bottles
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Groceries
products.facts: ["The Simply tomato ketchup bottle is made from recyclable plastic, promoting sustainability.","The bottle is designed to minimize waste, allowing for easy dispensing of ketchup without clogging.","Simply tomato ketchup is made with non-GMO ingredients, ensuring a quality product free from genetically modified organisms.","The packaging is BPA-free, ensuring safety and quality for consumers."]

products.name: Skittles
products.facts: ["Skittles are made primarily from sugar, corn syrup, and hydrogenated palm kernel oil.","Skittles are certified as gluten-free and do not contain any animal-derived ingredients, making them suitable for vegans.","The packaging of Skittles is recyclable in some areas, promoting eco-friendliness.","Skittles are produced in a facility that adheres to strict quality control standards to ensure consistency and safety."]

products.name: Chìçkfìlà Sauce
products.facts: ["ChÃ¬Ã§kfÃ¬lÃ  Sauce is made from a blend of ingredients including mayonnaise, mustard, and a variety of spices.","The sauce is gluten-free, making it suitable for individuals with gluten sensitivities.","ChÃ¬Ã§kfÃ¬lÃ  prioritizes sourcing ingredients from suppliers that adhere to sustainable and responsible practices.","The sauce contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a more natural quality product."]

products.name: Mayonnaise
products.facts: ["Mayonnaise is primarily made from egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice.","Many commercial mayonnaise brands use pasteurized eggs to ensure food safety and extend shelf life.","Eco-friendly mayonnaise options are available, made from organic ingredients and sustainable packaging.","Quality mayonnaise contains no artificial preservatives and is often labeled as 'natural' or 'organic'."]

products.name: Freddos
products.facts: ["Freddos are made with high-quality cocoa sourced from sustainable farms.","The packaging is recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Freddos are gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary preferences.","The brand emphasizes ethical sourcing, ensuring fair trade practices in its supply chain."]
